location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Pringle Riach, Acting Resident, Bushire to Captain George Herne, the Honourable Company's Cruiser Benares, commanding at Katiffe [Al-Qaṭīf]

mods.abstract: The letter concerns the seizure of an Abothebee [Abu Dhabi] boat by people from Bedda under the authority of Soveedan been Zal. Riach regrets that Herne had not managed to obtain an independent account of what had happened.
